title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with grated parmesan.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture off the heat.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Popular Indian curry with marinated chicken in a spiced tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 1 hour.
Cook onion until soft, add marinated chicken and cook through.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in cream and garnish with cilantro.

title: Chocolate Souffl√©
description: Rich and airy chocolate dessert, perfect for special occasions.
instructions: Separate eggs and beat yolks with sugar.
Whisk egg whites with salt until stiff peaks form.
Fold whites into chocolate mixture and bake.
